scope.title: Skip Link
scope.description: Skip links are internal page links that aid navigation around a page. They are detected by screen readers and help users quickly jump to and over content on the page.

data.title: Skip Link
data.description: Skip links are internal page links that aid navigation around a page. They are detected by screen readers and help users quickly jump to and over content on the page.
